headline: A Look At Expand Energy (EXE) Valuation After CEO Change And Planned Move To Houston
summary: Expand Energy (EXE) is back in focus after a leadership shake up and a planned headquarters move, with Chairman Michael Wichterich stepping in as interim CEO as the company prepares to relocate to Houston. See our latest analysis for Expand Energy. The leadership change and planned move to Houston have come as the share price has softened in the short term, with a 7 day share price return of 5.8% and a 90 day share price return decline of 14.44%. Meanwhile, the 3 year total shareholder return...

headline: Expand Energy to Report Q4 Earnings: What's in the Offing?
summary: EXE gears up for Q4 earnings with higher profit and revenue estimates as efficiency gains help offset natural gas price volatility.

headline: Expand Energy Shake Up And Houston Move Raise Valuation Questions
summary: Expand Energy (NasdaqGS:EXE) has appointed Michael Wichterich as Interim CEO following a leadership shake up. The company is relocating its corporate headquarters to Houston as part of the same transition. These moves mark a significant shift in how the business is organized and led. Shares of Expand Energy (NasdaqGS:EXE) last closed at $102.21, with a 3 year return of 35.3% and a 5 year return of 195.1%. Short term performance has been mixed, including a 5.8% decline over the past week and...

headline: The 10 Fastest-Growing S&P 500 Stocks Of 2025 Blast Past The Rest
summary: In an age of tariffs and inflation, S&P 500 growth is golden. And some companies are shining. Ten companies in the S&P 500 — including Expand Energy, Nvidia and Robinhood — either already posted or are expected to report 2025 revenue that's 51% or more higher than it was in 2024, says an Investor's Business Daily analysis of data from S&P Global Market Intelligence and MarketSurge.
